ageDisclaimer.title: 18+ Voucher purchase disclaimer
ageDisclaimer.subtitle: This kiosk provides access to betting services intended for users aged 18 and above only. By proceeding, you confirm that you are of legal age and understand the risks associated with gambling. Please play responsibly.

paymentSuccessful.title: Payment Successful
paymentSuccessful.subtitle: Please be patient, while we are printing your voucher

insertCash.title: Insert cash
insertCash.noChangeWarning: The machine does not return change. Refunds are not available.

home.title: Welcome to VCash
home.body: Buy vouchers for sports betting, online gaming platforms, and pay your bills quickly and easily.

bettingServices.title: Betting services - VCash
bettingServices.body: For sports betting, Casino top-ups and other betting services

digitalServices.title: Digital services
digitalServices.body: For gaming, streaming, e-sims, top-ups and other services

billPayments.title: Bill payments
billPayments.body: Quickly scan your bill to pay via barcodes

qrModal.title: For more details about the product, scan the QR code to visit our marketplace app

voucherGenerated.title: Your voucher has been issued successfully

cashboxFullModal.title: Kiosk Cash Box Full
cashboxFullModal.subtitle: The cash deposit limit has been reached. You can generate a voucher for the amount you've inserted so far.

printerUnavailableModal.title: Printer Unavailable
printerUnavailableModal.subtitle: You can still redeem your voucher - just scan the QR code below or send it to your email

sessionTimeoutModal.title: Session Timeout
sessionTimeoutModal.subtitle: For your security, the session has expired due to inactivity. Please start again to continue.

welcome.title: Welcome to VCash
welcome.text: Buy vouchers, pay bills, or top up digital services in a few taps

emailInput.title: Send voucher via email
emailInput.description: We'll email your voucher - just drop your address below

register.title: Device Registration
register.approvalPending: Device approval is pending until approved by an Agent from the {{brandName}} network.
register.welcomeMessage: The device has been successfully registered. Welcome to the {{brandName}} network.
